question: prostatitis chronic bronchitis symptoms compare severity
generated_answer: I don't have enough information to compare the severity of symptoms between prostatitis and chronic bronchitis.
ground_truth_answer: While both conditions can be chronic, their symptoms differ in severity and nature. Chronic prostatitis symptoms are often mild and develop slowly over weeks/months, including discomfort and urinary issues. In contrast, chronic bronchitis symptoms are more severe, involving daily productive cough lasting at least 2 months for 2 consecutive years, along with significant breathing difficulties and chest pain that affect daily activities.
